title: May 2022 core update releasing for Google Search
description:
Several times per year, we make substantial improvements to our overall ranking processes,
      which we refer to as core updates. Core updates are designed to increase the overall
      relevancy of our search results and make them more helpful and useful for everyone. Today,
      we're releasing our May 2022 core update. It will take about 1-2 weeks to fully roll out.
